summary.para: This static class offers the entire site a centralised location for adding instances of .
This collection should then be emitted in a convenient location.
The developer can select whether to emit specific declarations in one location and the rest of the collection in a different location, or simply emit them all together in a single location.

member.name: M:SuperScript.Declarations.Emit(System.String[])
member.summary: Emits the instances.

param.name: declarationNames
param.para: If one or more (comma-separated) declarations are specified then only these declarations will be written to the
page at the current location (i.e. at the location where this method was called from).
Furthermore, these specified declarations will not be written out at a later time if and when this method is
called without any declarations being specified.

member.returns: The formatted output for each instance of .
member.exception: The property has not been instantiated This should be done for each HTTP request.
No implementation of has been configured.
